#id=1
#text=I had n't gone for a hair cut in about 7 weeks so I was certainly due .
#id=2
#text=The hair around the side of my head was starting to grow over my ears .
#id=3
#text=I generally go the same hairdresser and ask for the same person , Sue who is very good at her job and is quite pleasant .
#id=4
#text=So I make an appointment with Sue for the following Saturday morning .
#id=5
#text=When I arrived the place was rather full with customers , seemingly more woman than men .
#id=6
#text=Several people were covered with the big hair drying bag over their head which makes me giggle .
#id=7
#text=I was told to go right in the back where the men 's area is located and sat down for my hair cut .
#id=8
#text=After having my hair washed by a helper I was soon seated at Sue 's chair and enjoyed our usual small talk while she cut my hair .
#id=9
#text=We discussed recent weekend getaways and holiday family gatherings .
#text=After she was done I gave her my usual tip and was on my way .
